milestone1.title: Data cleaning and validation
milestone1.description: We will conduct data quality checks, resolve issues with the data quality, and document this process

issue.title: Define data quality standards
issue.body: List out decision rules to check data quality

issue.title: Assess data quality
issue.body: Use assertthat to test decision rules on dataset

issue.title: Resolve data quality issues
issue.body: Conduct needed research to resole any issues

milestone2.title: Exploratory data analysis
milestone2.description: Produce basic views and summary statistics to understand dataset and relationships
